title: insufficient encryption
extract: The software does not encrypt sensitive or critical information before storage or transmission. Extended Description. The lack of proper data encryption passes up the guarantees of confidentiality, integrity, and accountability that properly implemented encryption conveys.
extract_html: The software does not encrypt sensitive or critical information before storage or transmission. Extended Description. The lack of proper data encryption passes up the guarantees of confidentiality, integrity, and accountability that properly implemented encryption conveys.
